articles.description: Rockstar has revealed the summer update for GTA Online, dubbed 'San Andreas Mercenaries'. It's arriving June 13th - here's what we know.
articles.content: It was revealed by Rockstar Games that the sizeable summer update for GTA Online will be dropping earlier than usual this year, which has – for some reason – prompted fans to believe that it’s becaus… [+2065 chars]
